attributes.action: Legalise the recreational use of cannabis in the united kingdom
attributes.additional_details: for people with adhd or other mental conditions to calm down their mind
attributes.background: The recreational use of cannabis will save the government a lot of money and time that they have been using for the possession of cannabis and cannabis can be used for adhd and many mental conditions

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614503
